pull.title: Include cleanup
pull.body:
Continues https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/5697

I'm very open to squash anything, separate foreach into a different PR or some other suggestion that it's mostly include-only.

Less to catch these days, that's a good sign
Related branch: https://github.com/jtimon/bitcoin/commits/long-globals

verification.payload:

committer Jorge Timón <jtimon@jtimon.cc> 1492043247 +0200

Trivial: Remove unneeded includes from .h:

- validation.h doesn't need to include chain.h anymore
- Remove unneeded includes from net.h

events.body: Fixed @TheBlueMatt 's nit and removed the commit dealing with boost/foreach.hpp since that's dealt with differently but more completely in #10193.

comments.body: I'm not convinced this is OK. We use signals in CNodeSignals a bit later down in this file. I think you're using the indirect include from addrman -> util.
